name: welldoc-bddframework
description: BDD framework using Cucumber + Playwright + Allure

scripts.test:user: set REPORT_NAME=user && cucumber-js src/test/features/userManagement.feature --require-module ts-node/register --require src/test/steps/**/*.ts --require src/test/hooks/**/*.ts -t "@UserManagement" --format json:test-results/cucumber_report_user.json || exit 0
scripts.test:login: set REPORT_NAME=login && cucumber-js src/test/features/login.feature --require-module ts-node/register --require src/test/steps/**/*.ts --require src/test/hooks/**/*.ts --tags "@Login" --format json:test-results/cucumber_report_login.json ||exit 0
scripts.test:all: set REPORT_NAME=all && cucumber-js src/test/features --require-module ts-node/register --require src/test/steps/**/*.ts --format json:test-results/cucumber_report_all.json ||exit 0
scripts.test:tag: set REPORT_NAME=tag && cucumber-js src/test/features --require-module ts-node/register --require src/test/steps/**/*.ts --require src/test/hooks/**/*.ts --tags "%npm_config_tag%" --format json:test-results/cucumber_report_tag.json || exit 0
scripts.allure:report: npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
